posts.content:
Sir,
I haven’t received bonus marks in ga4 as, i posted queries in discourse regarding ga4. I have scored 8 marks in ga4, but after bonus marks it should be 9, but in dashboard it is showing only 80 marks.
Kindly, update my marks in dashboard.
@carlton , @Jivraj , @Saransh_Saini

Hi @Sakshi6479,
You have not followed the instruction in GA4 for the bonus mark.
Screenshot 2025-03-18 at 11.02.31 am2566×224 23.2 KB
We were given the list by Anand for all those that followed this instruction.
That is why you have not received the bonus mark for GA4.
Kind regards
posts.image_description: The image shows a promotional notice. The primary message is that students can earn bonus marks for posting on "Discourse". Specifically, IITM BS students who contribute to the "GA4 - Data Sourcing - Discussion Thread [TDS Jan 2025]" with a 'relevant' question or reply will receive a 1-point bonus on their graded assignment. The terms "GA4 - Data Sourcing - Discussion Thread [TDS Jan 2025]" and "relevant" are highlighted, likely to draw attention to the specific forum and the quality of contribution required for bonus marks.
